column1: Senator Brown is a treasure. https://t.co/SyXuAL0tQa
We pray for the men women and children put at risk by the President's unilateral action. The Trump Administration must immediately work to deescalate tensions. No more endless wars. #NoWarWithIran

President Trump is guilty of abusing his power by strengthening liberty’s adversary. He has obstructed Congress in his failure to comply with lawful subpoenas. His actions subvert US national security by emboldening Vladimir Putin. I am voting to impeach. https://t.co/0wzZqy77Qj
